name: Oceanfarm (Demo Day 25 Alpha Build)
description:
A farming RPG set on a flooded world where only islands remain. At least, an early alpha version of it.

This should be a good "vertical slice" of what to expect in the full game. Some important things (like NPCs and housing) aren't in yet, but those will come later.

Some things might be broken as heck. I *think* I got all the important bugs, but of course there'll still be some that I haven't found or been able to fix, mainly with saving or visual errors. Let me know of any issues you find!

Controller support IS in, but I've only tested it with an Xbox One controller, and button prompts will show up as xbox regardless of what controller you're actually using.
